DOC.brief_summary: Human milk feeding associate great benefit health development infant , especially premature infant . Some mother unable unwilling provide breast milk infant . The use donor human milk product low birth weight infant alternative cow milk rise dramatically past year . Purpose : To evaluate post-discharge growth neurodevelopment infant less equal 1250 gram birth weight receive exclusive human milk protein diet .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Discharge Growth Infants Who Received Donor Human Milk Products Neonatal Intensive Care Unit ( NICU )
DOC.detailed_description: An exclusive human milk protein diet infant less 1250 gram birth weight show reduce rate necrotizing enterocolitis , devastate intestinal disease premature infant , 50 % . New guideline introduce 2009 Texas Children 's Hospital outline appropriate use donor human milk product . First , infants previous study identify recruit study . Other potential subject ( infant ) identify GCRC nurse staff Texas Childrens Hospital upon admission neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) ( Levels 2 3 ) communicate PI PIs staff . This study include three visit : 1 . Outpatient visit 12 15 month correct gestational age- first outpatient visit obtain baseline anthropometric data , interim medical history , demographic socioeconomic information , nutrition history child since discharge ( formula , human milk , vitamin , medication ) , check hemoglobin ferritin . Parents bring child labs pediatrician give permission record access Epic receive care Texas Childrens Pediatric Associates . If record obtain , labs drawn visit . Some historical information may obtain via telephone prior outpatient visit . 2 . Outpatient visit 18 22 month correct gestational age- second outpatient visit collection anthropometric data , interim medical history , demographic socioeconomic information , nutrition history , routine Neurodevelopmental Evaluation part standard follow-up extremely low birth weight infant ( The Bayley Scales Infant Development II ) administer certified tester ( trained professional ) , whole body dual energy x-ray absorptiometry ( DXA ) perform . Some historical information may obtain via telephone prior outpatient visit . We also obtain height weight mom dad visit . 3 . Outpatient visit 5 year age- third outpatient visit collection anthropometric data , interim medical history , demographic socioeconomic information , nutrition history developmental evaluation routine school age child . Some historical information may obtain via telephone prior outpatient visit . If infant originally follow H-26923 study , additional data collect infant chart hospitalization NICU . Data collect include : anthropometrics birth discharge , enteral feeding data parenteral nutrition throughout admission , nutrition relate lab , APGAR score , medications- lasix , chlorothiazide , dopamine , hydrocortisone dexamethasone , morbidity necrotizing enterocolitis , patent ductus arteriosus , spontaneous intestinal perforation , intraventricular hemorrhage , sepsis , chronic lung disease . If infant re-hospitalized receive primary care Texas Childrens Pediatrics Associates Clinic , consent subject parent , would collect information chart include : interim anthropometric data , interim medical history , nutrition data history , nutrition relate lab . No intervention part protocol .
DOC.criteria: Premature infant ( < 37 week gestation ) birth weight less equal 1250 gram birth weight receive donor human milk product NICU hospitalization . Infants birth weight great 1250 gram . Infants transfer outside hospital TCH great one week age . Infants achieve enteral feed 4 week age . Infants major congenital anomaly . Infants die within first 48 hour admission TCH .
